name: Small Kaiju (LD49)
description:
LD Entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/small-kaiju

A (relatively) friendly local cryptid grows aggressive as more and more people settle in its valley home.

=== META INFO ====

Use Arrow Keys to move, Z to swing, and Space to jump.

Developer Time: ~53 seconds

Tools Used: Godot Engine 3.3, Audacity, Krita
